flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to replace 30*10=<<30*10=300>>300 ball bearings
The normal price is 300*1=$<<300*1=300>>300
Because of the sale he only has to pay 300*0.75=$<<300*0.75=225>>225
He then gets a discount which shaves another 225*0.2=$<<225*0.2=45>>45 off the price
That means he only pays 225-45=$<<225-45=183>>183
So he saved 300-183=$<<300-183=117>>117
#### 117

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 183. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
